apps.name: Bear
apps.subtitle: Beautiful and powerfull Markdown app
apps.localizedDescription: Bear is beautiful, powerfull simple Markdown app to capture, write and organize your life.

privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: Used to insert images from the media into notes.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: Used to insert images from the camera into notes.
privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Bear uses Face ID to let you lock and unlock notes.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Used to record videos in order to insert them into notes.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Used to insert images from the photo library into notes.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Used to insert images from the photo library into notes.

apps.name: Walllpaper Central
apps.subtitle: Wallpapers with depth effect
apps.localizedDescription: Wallpapers Central is a service completely dedicated to the graphic customization of your devices

privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This identifiers will be used for deliver personalized ads to you.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This allows us to save images in your Photos App. Then you will able to set the downloaded image as a Live Wallpaper.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: This allows us to access to your deviceâ€™s camera and upload your shoots to Wallpapers Central.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This allows us to save images in your Photos App. Then you will able to set the downloaded image as a Wallpaper.
privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: This allows us to read your Photos and upload them on Wallpapers Central.

apps.name: Loot
apps.subtitle: Piggy bank with saving goals
apps.localizedDescription: Keep track of your savings goal in a personalised 3D money jar and feel rewarded for every dollar you put away!

privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This identifier will be used to deliver personalized ads to you.
